page.title: 04Recreation
page.content: Over the weekend beginning 17th May 1985 a survey was undertaken of local residents' views on the need for a community centre. Of the 416 people interviewed; 326 were in favour, 53 were against, 37 didn't comment. Main reasons for being in favour were; Sporting activities and functions157 Organisations to hold meetings 101 Bingo 53 Children's evening entertainment 28 Youth club 20 Play school 15 Important for devt. of village 12 Main reasons for negative responses were high cost and lack of demand. Most people thought it should be built on the recreation ground or at least somewhere central. There are now plans for Parish Rooms to be converted
